                                    Jan 2024 - June 2024
                                    Data Analyst
                                    L&A Logistics Zambia
                                    Lusaka, Zambia
                                
                            
                            
                                
                                    
                                        Designed interactive Power BI dashboards for business performance monitoring.
                                        Automated data extraction and transformation processes using SQL and Python.
                                        Collaborated with cross-functional teams to identify data-driven solutions.
                                        Improved data integrity and streamlined reporting processes.
                                    
                                
                            
                        
                    
                
                
                
                    
                        
                            
                                
                                    Jan 2023 - Dec 2023
                                    Business Intelligence Analyst
                                    Entrepreneurs Financial Center
                                    Lusaka, Zambia
                                
                            
                            
                                
                                    
                                        Reduced non-performing loans by 10% using advanced SQL and CVM strategies.
                                        Developed and maintained Business Intelligence dashboards for real-time data visualization.
                                        Collaborated with cross-functional teams to identify and implement data-driven solutions.
                                        Conducted data analysis to support strategic decision-making and improve operational efficiency.
                                        Enhanced reporting efficiency through automation and real-time cloud data pipelines.
                                    
                                
                            
                        
                    
                
                
                
                    
                        
                            
                                
                                    July 2022 - Nov 2022
                                    Research Assistant
                                    Elite Africa Research
                                    Kitwe, Zambia
                                
                            
                            
                                
                                    
                                        Conducted data collection and analysis using SPSS for major research projects.
                                        Assisted in the preparation of research reports and presentations.
                                        Collaborated with team members to ensure data accuracy and integrity.
                                        Supported the development of research methodologies and data collection tools.
                                    
                                
                            
                        
                    
                
                
                
                    
                        
                            
                                
                                    Feb 2022 - June 2022
                                    Mathematics & Statistics Tutor
                                    Mulungushi University 
                                    Zambia
                                
                            
                            
                                
                                    
                                        Delivered tutorials in Business Mathematics, Statistics and Mathematical Methods.
                                        Assisted students in understanding complex mathematical concepts and problem-solving techniques.
                                        Provided one-on-one tutoring sessions to enhance students' academic performance.
                                        Evaluated student progress and provided feedback to improve learning outcomes.

title: Welcome To My Blog
text:
This is the first post in a Quarto blog. Welcome!

Since this post doesn’t specify an explicit image, the first image in the post will be used in the listing page of posts.

title: From Data to Impact
text:
DATA SCIENCE · BUSINESS INTELLIGENCE
    
  




  
  
  
    From Data to Impact
  

  
    I'm Mulimbika Makina, a Data Scientist with an MSc in Mathematics (Data Science Option),
    combining mathematical depth with statistical rigor to solve real-world problems.
  

  
    With expertise in Python, SQL, R,
    SPSS, STATA, Power BI, and
    Metabase, I build predictive models and intuitive dashboards that unlock real value.
